title: Cold Brew Pumpkin Spice Frappe (Vegan)
directions: In the bowl of a high powered blender, combine the cold brew concentrate, coconut milk ice cubes, ⅛ cup almond milk, ⅛ cup maple syrup, cinnamon, allspice, cloves, ginger, nutmeg, vanilla extract, and turmeric.
Taste and add more almond milk or maple syrup according to your preference, blending again to incorporate any additions.
ingredients: *4 fluid ounces best quality cold brew concentrate
10 frozen full fat coconut milk ice cubes
⅛ cup unsweetened almond milk + more according to your thickness preference
scant ⅛ cup maple syrup + more to taste
¼ teaspoon ground dried turmeric + up to ¼ tsp more depending on how orange you want it
